author: Mike Cherney
title: Scientists Want Regular People to Lend a Hand, Immediately Regret Asking
text:
SYDNEY—Australian scientists hoped a new app would allow anyone with a smartphone to record frog calls, revealing new insights about the roughly 240 native frog species on this landmass the size of the continental U.S.
Instead, the researchers—who sometimes spend hours each day listening to the recordings in an office at the Australian Museum in Sydney—often hear crickets. And birds, dogs and even humans having arguments.
